channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large furniture left close to my fense, 11th June
item.description:
Next to my fence, some neighbors left large unwanted furniture: old bed frame, boxes and rubbish is sitting next to it. Someone is doing refurbishing and all the rubbish is dumped right there which is absolutely disgusting
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hutchins Road, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obstructing the pavement, 11th June
item.description:
The works at 78 Kyverdale Road have blocked the pavement without a licence. This is a busy residential street with many families and buggies passing. Pedestrians are now forced to cross the road, but no safe crossing has been arranged, and signage is mini
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kyverdale Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped chair and rubbish, 11th June
item.description:
A chair and circa five large bags of rubbish have been dumped here. This is a known issue here and the bin should be urgently removed to prevent reoccurrence.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 96, Woolwich Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned clamped Ford Transit van - HF67 ZRT, 11th June
item.description:
This blue transit van with parking tickets and a clamp has been abandoned since April 2025 - over 2 months. It has not moved since and parked very badly to hedge. Full of rubbish inside. Bexley council please arrange for this van to be towed and removed please. There is a notice stuck to driver's window also.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Olyffe Avenue, East Wickham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
